mapper.select: select a.*, count(DISTINCT (b.id is not null or null)) as 'subStorageSum', count(tm.id is not null or null) as 'machineSum' from t_storage_location as a left join t_sub_storage_location as b on a.id = b.parent_storage_location_id left join t_machine as tm on tm.storage_location_id = b.id group by a.id
